When You Fly, We Fly
Here at Honeywell, we’re in the problem-solving business. Whether you have a quick question on a product or an airplane on the ground, we’re here to listen, we’re here to support and we’re here to act with levels of technical support only Honeywell can provide. On this page, you’ll find links to articles, tools and information that will help you access, and make the most of the best customer support in the business. Learn More. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/when-you-fly-we-fly?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> Portal Updates

New Innovations in Helicopter Displays - AW139 Phase 8
By Rob Erlick This article is the first in a series that takes a closer look at the Honeywell flight deck innovations for helicopters with the AW139 Phase 8 upgrade. This article describes the capabilities and benefits of SVS on the PFD.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/07/new-innovations-in-helicopter-displays?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> Service Information Letter (SIL) Briefing Avionics Cleaning Guidance - SIL D202004000758
